posts.text: ZingChart绘图需要的js及其他文件 ZingChart绘图需要的js及其他文件 成果图 <html><head> <script src="./zingchart/zingchart.min.js"></script> <script> zingchart.MODULESDIR = "./zingchart/modules/"; ZC.LICENSE = ["569d52cefae586f634c54f86dc99e6a9", "ee6b7db5b51705a13dc2339db3edaf6d"]; </script> <link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Josefin+Sans' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'> <style> .zc-ref { display: none; } </style></head><body> <div id='myChart'><a class="zc-ref" href="https://www.zingchart.com/">Charts by ZingChart</a></div> <script> zingchart.THEME = "classic"; var myConfig = { "type": "bar", "background-color": "black", "globals": { "font-family": "Josefin Sans", }, "shapes": [{ "type": "rectangle", "x": "83.5%", "y": "12.5%", "width": "165px", "height": "65px", "border-width": 1, "border-color": "#333", "background-color": "none" }], "labels": [{ "text": "Hover spikes for<br>details on data", "font-size": "14px", "x": "77%", "y": "9%", "font-color": "#ccc" }], "title": { "text": "September is the Coldest Month", "font-weight": "bold", "background-color": "none", "font-size": "24px", "align": "left", "color": "#c3e4ed", "margin-top": "12px" }, "subtitle": { "text": "Average monthly percentage change for the Dow Jones Industrial Average, 1929-2008", "background-color": "none", "font-size": "14px", "align": "left", "color": "#c3e4ed", "padding-top": "25px" }, "source": { "text": "Source: Data360.org, Inspired by The Wall Street Journal", "background-color": "none", "font-size": "11px", "color": "#8aa3aa", "offset-x": "-22%", "offset-y": "-10%" }, "plotarea": { "margin": "20% 5% 15% 7%" }, "scaleX": { "values": ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"], "guide": { "items": [{ "background-color": "black", "alpha": 1 }, { "background-color": "#333333", "alpha": 0.6 }] }, "labels": ["Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"], "item": { "offset-y": "-17%", "font-color": "#becfd4", "font-size": "11px" }, "line-style": "dotted", "line-color": "#becfd4", "line-width": "1px", "tick": { "line-color": "#becfd4", "size": "20px" } }, "scaleY": { "values": "-3:3:1", "item": { "offset-x": "7%", "offset-y": "-5%", "font-family": "Josefin Sans", "font-color": "#c3e4ed", "font-size": "11px" }, "line-width": "0px", "tick": { "visible": "false" }, "guide": { "line-style": "dotted", "alpha": "0.5", "line-color": "#c3e4ed" }, "format": "%v%" }, "plot": { "aspect": "cone" }, "series": [{ "values": [1.22, 0.1, 0.21, 1.36, 0.57, 1.35, 0.77, -1.46, -0.02, 0.6, 1.41, 1.60], "text": "1929-2008", "background-color": "#00baf0", "tooltip": { "text": "%v% average change<br>during month of %kv<br>between %t", "font-color": "#eee", "font-size": "14px", "shadow-alpha": "0", "fixed": true, "x": "72%", "y": "6%", "sticky": true, "timeout": 10000, "width": "165px", "height": "65px" }, "rules": [{ "rule": "%v < 0", "background-color": "#ccc #00baf0" }] }, { "values": [0.74, 0.51, 0.48, 2.39, 1.64, -0.76, 1.08, -1.14, -1.23, 1.13, 1.62, 1.78], "text": "1988-2008", "background-color": "#006a89", "tooltip": { "text": "%v% average change<br>during month of %kv<br>between %t", "font-color": "#eee", "font-size": "14px", "shadow-alpha": "0", "fixed": true, "x": "72%", "y": "6%", "sticky": true, "timeout": 10000, "width": "165px", "height": "65px" }, "rules": [{ "rule": "%v < 0", "background-color": "#ccc #006a89" }] }, { "values": [-0.99, -0.43, 1.04, 2.75, 0.31, -1.52, -0.51, -0.74, -2.72, 2.11, 1.45, 1.41], "text": "1998-2008", "background-color": "#004357", "tooltip": { "text": "%v% average change<br>during month of %kv<br>between %t", "font-color": "#eee", "font-size": "14px", "shadow-alpha": "0", "fixed": true, "x": "72%", "y": "6%", "sticky": true, "timeout": 10000, "width": "165px", "height": "65px" }, "rules": [{ "rule": "%v < 0", "background-color": "#ccc #004357" }] }] }; zingchart.render({ id: 'myChart', data: myConfig, height: 500, width: 725 }); </script></body></html>

posts.title: 3D中国地图+柱形图
posts.excerpt: 成果图 第一步：使用itchat包爬取自己的微信好友列表 这个部分在以往的文章中有详细步骤 第二步：数据处理1234567use 我的微信好友列表, clearcontract provincedrop if ustrregexm(province, "[a-z]")drop if province == ""ren _freq numchinagcode,baidukey(tXvh2UTmo4z0zq5t41XLPTm1kQbMHjYl) province(province)save 每个省的好友数量, replace
posts.text: 成果图 第一步：使用itchat包爬取自己的微信好友列表 这个部分在以往的文章中有详细步骤 第二步：数据处理1234567use 我的微信好友列表, clearcontract provincedrop if ustrregexm(province, "[a-z]")drop if province == ""ren _freq numchinagcode,baidukey(tXvh2UTmo4z0zq5t41XLPTm1kQbMHjYl) province(province)save 每个省的好友数量, replace 第三步：绘图123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100cd "/Users/mr.cheng/Desktop/3D中国地图"use 每个省的好友数量, clear* 因为广东和安徽的人太多了，画出来的图不好看，所以就减为20吧replace num = 20 if inlist(province, "广东", "安徽")jscopyfw, s h(带柱形图的3D中国地图)lib, b s(dark)fw `"let geoCoordMap = {"'forval i = 1/`=_N'{ local var = `" "`=province[`i']'": [`=longitude[`i']', `=latitude[`i']'], "' fw `"`var'"'}fw `" };"'fw `"var convertData = function(data) {"'fw `" var res = [];"'fw `" for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {"'fw `" var geoCoord = geoCoordMap[data[i].name];"'fw `" if (geoCoord) {"'fw `" res.push({"'fw `" name: data[i].name,"'fw `" value: geoCoord.concat(data[i].value)"'fw `" });"'fw `" }"'fw `" }"'fw `" // console.log(res)"'fw `" return res;"'fw `" };"'fw `" myChart.setOption({"'fw `" geo3D: {"'fw `" map: 'china',"'fw `" roam: true,"'fw `" itemStyle: {"'fw `" areaColor: '#1d5e98',"'fw `" opacity: 1,"'fw `" borderWidth: 0.4,"'fw `" borderColor: '#000'"'fw `" },"'fw `" label: {"'fw `" show: true,"'fw `" textStyle: {"'fw `" color: '#000', //地图初始化区域字体颜色"'fw `" fontSize: 8,"'fw `" opacity: 1,"'fw `" backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,23,11,0)'"'fw `" },"'fw `" },"'fw `" emphasis: { //当鼠标放上去 地区区域是否显示名称"'fw `" label: {"'fw `" show: true,"'fw `" textStyle: {"'fw `" color: '#fff',"'fw `" fontSize: 3,"'fw `" backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,23,11,0)'"'fw `" }"'fw `" }"'fw `" },"'fw `" //shading: 'lambert',"'fw `" light: { //光照阴影"'fw `" main: {"'fw `" color: '#fff', //光照颜色"'fw `" intensity: 1.2, //光照强度"'fw `" //shadowQuality: 'high', //阴影亮度"'fw `" shadow: false, //是否显示阴影"'fw `" alpha:55,"'fw `" beta:10"'fw `" },"'fw `" ambient: {"'fw `" intensity: 0.3"'fw `" }"'fw `" }"'fw `" },"'fw `" series: ["'fw `" //柱状图"'fw `" {"'fw `" name: 'bar3D',"'fw `" type: "bar3D","'fw `" coordinateSystem: 'geo3D',"'fw `" barSize: 1, //柱子粗细"'fw `" shading: 'lambert',"'fw `" opacity: 1,"'fw `" bevelSize:0.3,"'fw `" label: {"'fw `" show: false,"'fw `" formatter: '{b}'"'fw `" },"'fw `" data: convertData(["'forval i = 1/`=_N'{ local var = `" {name: "`=province[`i']'", value: `=num[`i']'}, "' fw `"`var'"'}fw `" ]),"'fw `" },"'fw `" ]"'fw `" });"'fw, e t
